questions.question: Could I have .......................... piece of cake?
We must love one ...........................
questions.description: We use another in the expression 'one another'.

questions.question: The two brothers love each ..........................
questions.description: We use other in the expressions 'each other'.

questions.question: I would like .............................. cup of tea.
questions.description: Another is used with singular countable nouns.

questions.question: Would you like .............................. rice?
questions.description: We use more with plural and uncountable nouns. Another and other are not possible.

questions.question: The ................................. students have gone home.
questions.description: We use other before a plural noun.

questions.question: Where are the .............................. books you borrowed from me?
questions.description: Other can mean besides this or these

questions.question: I don't like these. Have you got any ............................. colors?
questions.description: Other has no plural form before a noun.

questions.question: You never think of ............................
questions.description: When other is used without a noun, it is used in its plural form.

questions.question: The meeting has been postponed. You must inform the .............................
